dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright violation]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, March 14, 2005 3:47 PM
To: peter@miro.com.au
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright violation]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright violation
Date: Sat, 12 Mar 2005 19:59:39 +1100
From: Peter Lamont <peter@miro.com.au>
Reply-To: peter@miro.com.au
Organization: Miro International
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>

Sirs,

I am writing to inform you that one of your clients on IP address
67.18.93.122 is representing a copy of our software as their own and by
making alterations to and removing our copyright notices, is in violation of
our copyright, the GNU GPL and our terms of use.

The software I refer to is Mambo, a content management system for which we
are the copyright and trademark owner.

Would you please take steps to have this client cease and desist
immediately.

Regards,

Peter Lamont
CEO
Miro International Pty Ltd
Charter House, Level 2, 4-10 Bank Place
Melbourne 3000, Australia

Tel: +613 9640 0300  |  Fax: +613 9640 0311

www.miro.com.au  |  www.websend.com.au  |  www.mironet.com.au

This e-mail and any attachments may be confidential. You must not disclose
or use the information contained in this e-mail if you are not the intended
recipient. If you have received this e-mail in error, please notify us
immediately and delete the e-mail and all copies. Miro does not guarantee
that this e-mail is virus or error free. The attached files are provided and
may only be used on the basis that the user assumes all responsibility for
any loss, damage or consequence resulting directly or indirectly from the
use of the attached files, whether caused by the negligence of the sender or
not. Miro is not responsible for any changes made to a document other than
those made by Miro, or for the effect of any changes (not made by Miro) on a
document's meaning. The content and opinions in non-business e-mail are not
necessarily those of Miro. If this is a commercial electronic message within
the meaning of the Spam Act, you may indicate that you do not wish to
receive any further commercial electronic messages from Miro by sending an
e-mail to info@miro.com.au



- --
- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
THe Planet Internet Services, LLC
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.6 (GNU/Linux)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCNgZBvK/XpJs6oyURAsoQAJ0RFXjfslMm9Vbeqr/y2yjZt0pifgCdFhCX

=qTuo
